title: KINDRED SKIN IDEA!
body:
Pokémon trainer kindred. xD 
. Q- I don't know how you could change the bow. So.. lets just pretend her Q isn't an ability.
. W-  Wolf could be  ghastly/haunter/gengar. "Evolving" every time kindred levels her ultimate
. E-  Kindred could mark the enemy  with a Poké Ball symbol instead of that weird spiral thing.
. R--  could make a giant Poké Ball on the ground
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: oh yeah I know, just thought it would be fun to show people my ideas.
